body.p: To his Excellency Governor James F Robinson

Governor of the Commonwealth of Ky -- Your Petitioner Samuel W. Spencer States that he was at the March Term of the Gallatin Circuit Court found guilty on an indictment for negligently guarding the Jail of Gallatin County which contained Wm Ross who was indicted for Murder -- the Jury assessed a fine of One hundred Dollars on Your Petitioner -- which Sum is more than he is able to pay -- He is a verry poor man with a large Family depending upon him for Support & to Coerce the payment of Said fine -- would greatly distress his Family by taking from them the necessaries of life -- He may have acted negligently in the discharge of his duties as guard but with no fraudulent intent --
We therefore commend his cause to Your favorable consideration, & he will forever pray &, &.
The undersy Jurors recommend that Said fine be remitted.

W, S, Allen
